animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears, and I love to eat peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am the largest land animal.
🥜 I use my trunk to pick up food.
💧 I can use my trunk as a snorkel.

animal.question: I say 'Moo' and give milk. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥛 My milk is good for you.

animal.question: I have a long neck and spots. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I eat leaves from tall trees.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes. Who am I?
I live in the ocean and have eight arms. Who am I?

hints.text: 🔵 I can change color to camouflage.
🌊 I squirt ink when I'm scared.

animal.question: I waddle when I walk and love to swim. What am I?
I have a pouch and hop around. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦘 I carry my baby in my pouch.

animal.question: I hiss and slither on the ground, some are poisonous. Who am I?
I can fly but I'm not a bird, I come out at night. Who am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I can eat insects or fruit.

animal.question: I have a shell on my back and move very slowly. Who am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I can pull my head into my shell.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain or snow. I'm white and fluffy, and kids love to play with me. What am I?

hints.text: ⛄ You can build a snowman with me.

weather.question: I come after the rain, and I'm made of many colors. You can see me in the sky, but only if you're lucky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have a lot of colors.
💧 I appear when the sun shines through rain.
✨ I am an arc in the sky.

weather.question: I am hot, and I come out during the day. Plants need me to grow, and people wear sunglasses when I am around. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I give light to the Earth.

weather.question: I'm a windy storm that spins around and around. I have an eye, but I can't see. What am I?
I am wet and I fall from the sky. Without me, plants and animals can't survive. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You need an umbrella when I come.
🌊 I fill up rivers and lakes.

weather.question: I am a cloud that touches the ground. I can make it hard to see. What am I?

hints.text: 🌫️ I am like a low-lying cloud.
🚗 You need to drive carefully in me.

weather.question: I am a loud noise that comes with lightning. The farther away I am, the longer it takes to hear me. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am caused by electrical discharges.
👂 You hear me after you see lightning.

weather.question: I'm frozen raindrops falling from the sky. I can be small or big, and sometimes they can hurt. What am I?

hints.text: 🤕 They can sting when they hit you.

weather.question: I'm a long period of very little rain. Plants and animals suffer when I last for a long time. What am I?

hints.text: 🏜️ The land becomes very dry during me.

weather.question: I'm a huge storm that forms over warm ocean water. I have strong winds and heavy rain. What am I also known as?

hints.text: 🌊 I am a type of tropical cyclone.
🌀 My name depends on where I form in the world.
💨 I have sustained winds of at least 74 miles per hour.
